title: Director Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at St. Catherine University
Interview Descriptions: Very positive experience. There was a series of interviews with various stakeholder groups. I also engaged in a number of phone calls with the hiring manager to navigate the ins and outs of the role because it was going to be a brand new position within the university.
Interview Questions: They asked early about salary expectations

title: Career Specialist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at St. Catherine University
Interview Descriptions: 3 rounds of interviews, including one phone screening, one video, and one presentation. The interviews were primarily panel interviews or one on ones with supervisors. Everyone was very welcoming and kind!
Interview Questions: Can you walk us through your employment history?

title: Application Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at St. Catherine University (Saint Paul, MN) in Mar 2023
Interview Descriptions: The first interview is a 15 minute phone interview. I got asked three questions and then I got time at the end to ask any questions. If you do good in the phone interview, a search committee interview will be set up.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for St. Kates? Why do you like this position? Are you comfortable with taking on a behind the scenes role?

title: Adjunct Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at St. Catherine University
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was speedy and appropriate for the job. Everyone was warm and friendly. They moved it forward without having to do multiple interviews. I was very impressed with the process. I was very impressed with the process.
Interview Questions: Tell us about courses you've taught in the past and ones you would be open to teaching again.

title: Assistant Professor Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at St. Catherine University
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was thorough and detailed. There's an interview with a search committee and with the administration.  There's a campus tour, a job talk, and teaching demo. There's also a meeting with current students.
Interview Questions: How would you tie your research to the classes you could offer?

title: Student Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at St. Catherine University
Interview Descriptions: 1 day of meeting with 2 staffs. They asked questions about your skills, experience, work background. They also ask about references so they can communicate with your references to learn more about your work ethic... They also ask about your class schedule. This is to see if you could have flexibility in your schedule to work.
Interview Questions: What do you value in a supervisor?

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at St. Catherine University (New York, NY) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: Human Resources interview, followed by phone interview, more technical questions and less behavioural. Questions were long and extensive, requires quite a bit of preparation and time consuming.  Two sessions of phone interviews, by different interviewers, some tricky questions.
Interview Questions: behavioural: strengths and weaknesses

title: Student Ambassador Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at St. Catherine University
Interview Descriptions: Really relaxed.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Campus Security Interview
Application Type: The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at St. Catherine University (Saint Paul, MN) in Feb 2012
Interview Descriptions: Completed the first interview and have been called back for a second interview. Was called over a month after applying for the position. Asked basic questions: what do you know about the college, where do you see yourself in 10 years, describe a time when you had to act in an emergency, what do you do to de-stress, etc. Manager of the department was very friendly. I am told that the second interview will consist of a campus tour followed by a second interview with the manager.
Interview Questions: What does OSHA stand for and what do they do?

title: Student Life Staff Member Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at St. Catherine University (Minneapolis, MN) in Jul 2011
Interview Descriptions: Met with multiple people.  Each asked different questions, based on their particular functional area.  Was asked to present a topic of my choosing.  Was asked a mix of resume specific and behavioral questions.  Was asked to provide materials created in previous similar positions.  Interviewers were friendly and welcoming.  Not a stressful interview.  Had the opportunity to learn a great deal about the institution.
Interview Questions: Can you support the mission of the institution?

title: Library Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at St. Catherine University (Minneapolis, MN) in May 2008
Interview Descriptions: Part time position listed on the st kates website. I called the head librarian to see if the position was still available. As it turned out, they were pretty desperate for help. I had no prior experience and after the interview, she hired me on the spot. I interviewed well but they also really needed a few people right away so the timing helped.
Interview Questions: What are your biggest weaknesses?
